tabs.title: Tab

tabs.content:
// Use 'take' to view a sample number of records in the table and check the data.
KuCoinTable
| sort by  timestamp
| take 100


// View a representation of the schema as a table with column names, column type, and data type.
KuCoinTable
| getschema



// See the most recent data - records ingested in the last 24 hours.
KuCoinTable
| where ingestion_time() between (now(-1d) .. now())
| summarize count()

KuCoinTable
| count 

SELECT TOP 10 * FROM KuCoinTable ORDER BY date DESC, time DESC

EXPLAIN
SELECT TOP 10 * FROM KuCoinTable ORDER BY date DESC, time DESC

KuCoinTable
| project source, pair, price, timestamp, ['date'], ['time']
| sort by ['date'] desc nulls last, ['time'] desc nulls last
| take int(10)
